title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 5A.01 - Function
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 5A.01 - Function

State Regulations
INSERT the following Paragraphs: Standard: 05A All traffic control devices found in Part 5 shall
conform to the provisions located in other Parts of this Manual and the New

York State Supplement. Support: 05B The MUTCD and the New York State Supplement list the
acceptable traffic control devices that may be used on highways in New

York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
5A.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
